name: Boat Race (itch)
description:
This is my first time i have participated in a game jam -weekly game jam 151- and the theme was "Olympic Games" so i think why not making an endless game?!

My game is 2d pixel art endless game devoloped from scratch -no engine-  with c++ and SDL2 libray. It tooks 4 days -4 hours per day- for devolopment and 2 days for bug fixes and uploading the project on itch.

I hope that you will enjoy it.
